resources.string: This application is designed to help blind people navigate through the bottom floor of ECSS. Press and hold the screen until you hear a sound, after which you can say your destination, which is a room number. If it exists, the application will tell you to take a number of steps or turn to some angle. After you have taken a step or turned, tap the screen, so the application will know where you are. You will shortly arrive at your destination.
